name: CLARITY_LOT
description: This table contains most of the information about the lot number records in the Lot Number (LOT) master file.

columns.name: LOT_NUM_ID_LOT_NUM
columns.description: The lot number on the vial for a given medication or immunization.

columns.name: LOT_NUM
columns.description: The lot number on the vial for a given medication or immunization.
